sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_COMMERCIAL_COPY.NEXTVAL from dual
INSERT INTO COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_COPY( N_COMMERCIAL_COPY_ID, N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, N_LOGIN_ID, CONTACTS_NAME, CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, FIXED_PHONE, MOBILE, CONTACTS_EMAIL, CORPORATE_NAME, CORPORATE_LOCATION, CORPORATE_PROPERTY, CORPORATE_TRADE, N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, D_FOUND_DATE, N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, POSTALCODE, UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, D_CREATE_DATE, N_CREATED, D_MODIFY_DATE, N_MODIFIED, AUTHENTICATION_STATUS, BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, REGISTER_BANKROLL, BUSINESS_SCOPE, BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT, BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME, COMPANY_ACCOUNT, N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, LOCATION, CERTIFICATE_PICTURE, BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION, BLINCE_STARTDATE, BLINCE_ENDDATE, BLINCE_VERIFY, CID_VERIFY, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID, TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER, TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY, G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE, TRCCOPY_VERIFY, GTC_VERIFY, ATAX_VERIFY, REVIEW_CHANGE, TAX_REGISTRATION_CNO, PHONE, ORGANIZATION_URL,DESCRIPTION,CREDIT_RATING ) VALUES ( #commercialCopyId#, #commercialTenantId#, #loginId#, #contactsName#, #contactsDepartment#, #fixedPhone#, #mobile#, #contactsEmail#, #corporateName#, #corporateLocation#, #corporateProperty#, #corporateTrade#, #enterpriseNumberOfPeople#, #foundDate#, #enterpriseStatus#, #postalcode#, #uploadBusinessLicencePictur#, #organizationCode#, #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ#, #enterpriseRealmName#, #createDate#, #created#, #modifyDate#, #modified#, #authenticationStatus#, #businessLicenceRegister#, #businessTimeLimit#, #registerBankroll#, #businessScope#, #bankAccountName#, #bankOfDeposit#, #bankOfDepositBranchName#, #companyAccount#, #certificateType#, #certificateNumber#, #location#, #certificatePicture#, #businessLicenceLocation#, #blinceStartdate#, #blinceEnddate#, #blinceVerify#, #cidVerify#, #province#, #city#, #area#, #certificateOthersid#, #taxpayerIdnumber#, #taxRegCertificateCopy#, #taxpayerCertificate#, #trccopyVerify#, #gtcVerify#, #ataxVerify#, #reviewChange#, #taxRegistrationCno#, #phone#, #organizationUrl#,#description#,#creditRating# )
sqlMap.update:
update COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_INFO
N_LOGIN_ID = #loginId:DECIMAL#
ATAX_VERIFY = #ataxVerify#
ATAX_VERIFY = #ataxVerify#
CONTACTS_NAME = #contactsName:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT = #contactsDepartment:VARCHAR#
FIXED_PHONE = #fixedPhone:VARCHAR#
MOBILE = #mobile:VARCHAR#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #businessLicenceRegister:VARCHAR#
BLINCE_STARTDATE=#blinceStartdate#
BLINCE_ENDDATE=#blinceEnddate#
BLINCE_VERIFY=#blinceVerify:DECIMAL#
BLINCE_VERIFY=#blinceVerify:DECIMAL#
BLINCE_STARTDATE = null
BLINCE_ENDDATE = null
CID_VERIFY=#cidVerify:DECIMAL#
CID_VERIFY = #cidVerify#
PROVINCE=#province:VARCHAR#
CITY=#city:VARCHAR#
AREA=#area:VARCHAR#
CONTACTS_EMAIL = #contactsEmail:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_NAME = #corporateName:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_LOCATION = #corporateLocation:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_PROPERTY = #corporateProperty:VARCHAR#
CORPORATE_TRADE = #corporateTrade:VARCHAR#
N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE = #enterpriseNumberOfPeople:DECIMAL#
D_FOUND_DATE = #foundDate:DATE#
N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS = #enterpriseStatus:DECIMAL#
POSTALCODE = #postalcode:VARCHAR#
UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR = #uploadBusinessLicencePictur:VARCHAR#
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #organizationCode:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ:VARCHAR#
ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #enterpriseRealmName:VARCHAR#
D_CREATE_DATE = #createDate:DATE#
N_CREATED = #created:DECIMAL#
D_MODIFY_DATE = #modifyDate:DATE#
N_MODIFIED = #modified:DECIMAL#
N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #certificateType:DECIMAL#
CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #certificateNumber:VARCHAR#
AUTHENTICATION_STATUS = #authenticationStatus:DECIMAL#
CERTIFICATE_PICTURE = #certificatePicture#
TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY = #taxRegCertificateCopy#
G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE = #taxpayerCertificate#
TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER = #taxpayerIdnumber#
BANK_OF_DEPOSIT = #bankOfDeposit#
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #companyAccount#
CREDIT_RATING = #creditRating#
TRCCOPY_VERIFY = #trccopyVerify#
TRCCOPY_VERIFY = #trccopyVerify#
GTC_VERIFY = #gtcVerify#
GTC_VERIFY = #gtcVerify#
where N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #commercialTenantId:DECIMAL#

ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #enterpriseRealmName#

BLINCE_STARTDATE = null
BLINCE_ENDDATE = null
AUTHENTICATION_STATUS = #authenticationStatus#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER = #businessLicenceRegister#
BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT = #businessTimeLimit#
REGISTER_BANKROLL = #registerBankroll#

BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME = #bankAccountName#
BANK_OF_DEPOSIT = #bankOfDeposit#
BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME = #bankOfDepositBranchName#
COMPANY_ACCOUNT = #companyAccount#
N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE = #certificateType#
CERTIFICATE_NUMBER = #certificateNumber#
LOCATION = #location#
CERTIFICATE_PICTURE = #certificatePicture#
BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION = #businessLicenceLocation#
BLINCE_VERIFY = #blinceVerify#
CID_VERIFY = #cidVerify#
PROVINCE = #province#
CITY = #city#
AREA = #area#
CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID = #certificateOthersid#
TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER = #taxpayerIdnumber#
TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY = #taxRegCertificateCopy#
G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE = #taxpayerCertificate#

DESCRIPTION = #description#

WHERE N_COMMERCIAL_COPY_ID = #commercialCopyId#

ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV = #enterpriseLegalRepresentativ#
ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME = #enterpriseRealmName#

N_CREATED = #created#

N_MODIFIED = #modified#

BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT = #businessTimeLimit#

sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_COPY WHERE N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID = #commercialTenantId# AND REVIEW_CHANGE=0
sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_COPY A ,LOGIN_INFO B, login_rose_rel C where C.n_Login_Id=B.n_Login_Id and A.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID=c.n_commercial_id and C.N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID =4
B.LOGIN_ACCOUNT like '%$loginName$%'
A.CONTACTS_NAME like '%$contactsName$%'
A.BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER like '%$businessLicenceRegister$%'
A.REVIEW_CHANGE = #reviewChange:DECIMAL#
A.MOBILE like '%$mobile$%'
A.CORPORATE_NAME like '%$corporateName$%'

select a1.N_COMMERCIAL_COPY_ID, a1.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, c.N_LOGIN_ID, a1.CONTACTS_NAME, a1.CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, a1.FIXED_PHONE, a1.MOBILE, a1.CONTACTS_EMAIL, a1.CORPORATE_NAME, a1.CORPORATE_LOCATION, a1.CORPORATE_PROPERTY, a1.CORPORATE_TRADE, a1.N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, a1.D_FOUND_DATE, a1.N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, a1.POSTALCODE, a1.UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, a1.ORGANIZATION_CODE, a1.ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, a1.ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, a1.D_CREATE_DATE, a1.N_CREATED, a1.D_MODIFY_DATE, a1.N_MODIFIED, a1.AUTHENTICATION_STATUS, a1.BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, a1.BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, a1.REGISTER_BANKROLL, a1.BUSINESS_SCOPE, a1.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, a1.BANK_OF_DEPOSIT, a1.BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME, a1.COMPANY_ACCOUNT, a1.N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, a1.CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, a1.LOCATION, a1.CERTIFICATE_PICTURE, a1.BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION, a1.BLINCE_STARTDATE, a1.BLINCE_ENDDATE, a1.BLINCE_VERIFY, a1.CID_VERIFY, a1.PROVINCE, a1.CITY, a1.AREA, a1.CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID, a1.TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER, a1.TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY, a1.G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE, a1.TRCCOPY_VERIFY, a1.GTC_VERIFY, a1.ATAX_VERIFY, a1.REVIEW_CHANGE, a1.TAX_REGISTRATION_CNO, a1.PHONE, a1.ORGANIZATION_URL, a1.CREDIT_RATING, a1.DESCRIPTION,B.LOGIN_ACCOUNT from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_COPY a1 ,LOGIN_INFO B, login_rose_rel C where C.n_Login_Id=B.n_Login_Id and a1.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID=c.n_commercial_id and C.N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID =4 and a1.n_commercial_copy_id=#nCommercialCopyId#

select * from (select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by a1.N_COMMERCIAL_COPY_ID desc) as view_row_number, a1.N_COMMERCIAL_COPY_ID, a1.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID, c.N_LOGIN_ID, a1.CONTACTS_NAME, a1.CONTACTS_DEPARTMENT, a1.FIXED_PHONE, a1.MOBILE, a1.CONTACTS_EMAIL, a1.CORPORATE_NAME, a1.CORPORATE_LOCATION, a1.CORPORATE_PROPERTY, a1.CORPORATE_TRADE, a1.N_ENTERPRISE_NUMBER_OF_PEOPLE, a1.D_FOUND_DATE, a1.N_ENTERPRISE_STATUS, a1.POSTALCODE, a1.UPLOAD_BUSINESS_LICENCE_PICTUR, a1.ORGANIZATION_CODE, a1.ENTERPRISE_LEGAL_REPRESENTATIV, a1.ENTERPRISE_REALM_NAME, a1.D_CREATE_DATE, a1.N_CREATED, a1.D_MODIFY_DATE, a1.N_MODIFIED, a1.AUTHENTICATION_STATUS, a1.BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER, a1.BUSINESS_TIME_LIMIT, a1.REGISTER_BANKROLL, a1.BUSINESS_SCOPE, a1.BANK_ACCOUNT_NAME, a1.BANK_OF_DEPOSIT, a1.BANK_OF_DEPOSIT_BRANCH_NAME, a1.COMPANY_ACCOUNT, a1.N_CERTIFICATE_TYPE, a1.CERTIFICATE_NUMBER, a1.LOCATION, a1.CERTIFICATE_PICTURE, a1.BUSINESS_LICENCE_LOCATION, a1.BLINCE_STARTDATE, a1.BLINCE_ENDDATE, a1.BLINCE_VERIFY, a1.CID_VERIFY, a1.PROVINCE, a1.CITY, a1.AREA, a1.CERTIFICATE_OTHERSID, a1.TAXPAYER_IDNUMBER, a1.TAX_REG_CERTIFICATE_COPY, a1.G_TAXPAYER_CERTIFICATE, a1.TRCCOPY_VERIFY, a1.GTC_VERIFY, a1.ATAX_VERIFY, a1.REVIEW_CHANGE, a1.TAX_REGISTRATION_CNO, a1.PHONE, a1.ORGANIZATION_URL, a1.CREDIT_RATING, a1.DESCRIPTION,B.LOGIN_ACCOUNT from COMMERCIAL_TENANT_BASIC_COPY a1 ,LOGIN_INFO B, login_rose_rel C where C.n_Login_Id=B.n_Login_Id and a1.N_COMMERCIAL_TENANT_ID=c.n_commercial_id and C.N_CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID =4
B.LOGIN_ACCOUNT like '%$loginName$%'
a1.CONTACTS_NAME like '%$contactsName$%'
a1.BUSINESS_LICENCE_REGISTER like '%$businessLicenceRegister$%'
a1.REVIEW_CHANGE = #reviewChange:DECIMAL#
a1.MOBILE like '%$mobile$%'
a1.CORPORATE_NAME like '%$corporateName$%'
) where view_row_number <= #max# and view_row_number > #skip#
select * from area_dict d where d.supperarea_id=#areaId:NUMBER#
